detail_desc: Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh details, a racer back and wide elasticated hem. Lined at the front. Medium support.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a text motif on the front.
Soft, non-wired bra in a silk blend with lace, lined cups and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Lace-covered elastic at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Loafers in imitation leather with a decorative seam at the front and metal rings at the top. Imitation leather linings and insoles.
Imitation leather sandals with adjustable foot straps and a loop at the back. Moulded rubber soles, fluted underneath.
3/4-length trousers in a cotton weave with wide, gathered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist. Wide, straight legs with scalloped broderie anglaise at the hems.
Jumper in a fine-knit viscose blend with a contrasting colour frilled collar and long sleeves with a contrasting colour frill at the cuffs.
Aqua shoes in scuba fabric with a loop front and back, and textured soles.

Short, A-line dress in woven fabric with a round, gathered neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. 3/4-length raglan balloon sleeves with narrow trims, and a gathered flounce at the hem for added width. Unlined.

Soft, non-wired lace bra with adjustable, double shoulder straps and padded, triangular cups with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Push-up bras in cotton jersey with lace details and underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Knee-length dress in pleated mesh with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, gathers at the top and a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist with a small frill. Concealed zip in one side and a gently flared, softly draping skirt. Lined.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in stretch denim with hard-worn details. Regular waist, a zip fly and button and skinny legs.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a motif on the front.
Metal keyring with a carabiner hook and padded imitation leather pendant. Length approx. 15 cm.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft knit with a foldover edge at the top, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
Trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist with a sewn-in tie detail.
Iron-on fabric patch to patch and repair garments. Size approx. 12 cm.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, inside-out, rib-knit viscose blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit moccasins with soft terry inside, imitation leather trims and soft suede soles.
Imitation leather trainers with embroidery, a lightly padded top edge, lacing at the front and a shimmering metallic detail at the heel. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Shorts in stretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, front and back pockets and a lace trim at the hems.
Cropped top in airy slub jersey. Deep V-neck with decorative buttons down the front and short, wide sleeves. Narrow elastication and a tie detail at the hem.
Top in light sweatshirt fabric with a washed look, print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a frill trim at the top, elasticated waist and side pockets.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with anti-slip protectors.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Bucket hat in organic cotton twill. Width of brim 7.5 cm. Lined.

Three-piece set in soft cotton jersey with a tunic, pair of leggings and matching hairband. Tunic with lace cap sleeves, a box pleat at the front and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Patterned leggings with covered elastication at the waist, and a patterned hairband with a sewn-on bow at the front.

Short, fitted dress in washed, stretch denim with narrow shoulder straps, a seam below the bust, and a gathered section at the front with a small frill trim at the top. Visible seams down the front and back and a visible zip at the back. Unlined.

Sunglasses with plastic frames, sidepieces and lenses. The lenses are UV-protective, tinted and polarised. Polarised lenses convey colours more clearly and provide stronger contrasts while preventing glare.

Cargo trousers in stretch twill made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening and a fake flap pocket at the back. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and covered elastic at the hems.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a drawstring at the sides and a high cut at the back.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of leggings in soft cotton jersey. Bodysuit with press-studs at the back and crotch. Ribbed leggings with an elasticated waist and decorative bow at the back.
Pyjamas in jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Leggings with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front, chest pocket, yoke with pleat at the back and ties at the hem.

Quilted waist bag in woven fabric with chain details. Large, zipped compartment at the front and an adjustable strap with a plastic fastener at the waist. Lined. Depth 8 cm. Height 10 cm. Width 20 cm.
Nursing top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a round neckline and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Wrapover front and a practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem.
Cropped top in soft, printed cotton jersey with long sleeves.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Skirt in a viscose weave with ties at the front of the waist and elastication at the back. Wrapover front with flounced trims and a seam with a flounce at the hem.

Shirt in stretch Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, classic front and a yoke and darts at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Short, straight-style T-shirt dress in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round, slightly wider neckline. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and short slits in the sides. Unlined.
Small bag in sturdy, grained imitation leather with a fixed shoulder strap and flap with studs and plastic beads. Magnetic fastener and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 6x13x20 cm.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Metal chain necklaces with pendants. Length 62 cm and 73 cm.
T-shirt and shorts set in cotton. Jersey T-shirt with a buttons placket. Shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
V-neck jumper in a soft, fine-knit merino wool blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit cotton jumper with long, rib-knit raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes along the short sides.
T-shirts in airy cotton jersey with a chest pocket and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Shirt in soft cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front, chest pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Founded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and ribbing around the neckline.
Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and short, drawstring sleeves. Seam under the bust and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Jacket in washed stretch twill with appliqués and a collar. Buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and buttoned cuffs.
Wide top in thin, printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood, low dropped shoulders, ribbed cuffs and a rolled, raw-edge hem.
Fully lined, 5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.

Straight-style, ankle-length dress in patterned satin with a draped collar and concealed zip at the back. Dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves and wide cuffs with a concealed zip. Diagonal seam from the hips, and an asymmetric hem. Unlined.
Trousers in stretch, lightweight twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud, and detachable elastic braces with imitation leather details.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, overlocked edges and ties with metal decorations.
Imitation leather bag with a narrow shoulder strap, zip at the top and one inner compartment. Size 13x17x22.5 cm.
Boxy top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with decorative seams. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in soft organic cotton jersey with elastication and a glittery drawstring at the waist, pockets in the side seams and gently tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Belt with a metal buckle. Width approx. 2.5 cm.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. 3/4-length, elasticated sleeves, buttons down the front and a seam with a drawstring at the waist.
Double-layered hat in soft jersey.
5-pocket slim-fit trousers in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
Trousers in twill made from a wool blend with a high waist, button and concealed zip at one side, side pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
Top in a soft, fine rib knit with a collar, button placket and long sleeves.

Hooded jacket in soft fleece designed to be worn either as a jacket or as a thermal mid layer. Zip down the front, extra-long raglan sleeves for increased mobility and minimal friction with thumbholes at the cuffs to help retain warmth outdoors, and a zipped chest pocket for safe storage of valuables. Rounded hem that is slightly longer at the back for a better fit when moving. Some of the polyester content of the jacket is recycled.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Blouse in an airy cotton weave with concealed buttons down the front, a small stand-up collar with a fold-down edge, and pin-tucks at the front. Extra-long puff sleeves lined with tulle at the top to add volume and accentuate the shoulders, and wide, buttoned cuffs. Yoke with a bellows pleat at the back for added width, and a rounded hem.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed cotton denim. Regular waist with elastication at the back, a zip fly and button, and wide, tapered legs.
Swim shorts and top in UV-protective fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves. Shorts with a frill at the top and lined gusset. UPF 50.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a narrow rib trim around the neckline, print motif on the front, cap sleeves and cut fringes at the hem.
